title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
Introducing the Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid! This exciting toy is perfect for children aged 6 and up. With its customizable arena and built-in phone holder, it's easy to play and keep your phone safe while battling. The arena also includes sparring totems for added fun.

The highlight of this set is the Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid action figure, known for its spinning feature and included ripcord. You can link multiple parts of the Dragonoid's ball to customize its appearance, making each battle unique. Plus, it's compatible with training sets (sold separately) for even more upgrading options.

This official Bakugan product comes with a deluxe arena, a special attack Bakugan, two clan flags, three sparring totems, a character card, a special attack card, two gate cards, an XL rip cord, and a Bakugan token. It's a complete playset that provides endless entertainment.

Rest assured, Spin Master, the manufacturer, is committed to quality and offers a care commitment for this product. Additionally, an online game code is included, allowing you to unlock special features in the popular Roblox game.

With its collectible aspects, such as special attack variants and battle packs, this Bakugan Battle Arena is sure to be a hit with both boys and girls. It's the ideal toy for action figure enthusiasts and those who love to collect.

Don't miss out on the fun! Get your Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid today and let the battles begin!

With its customizable arena, built-in phone holder, and included sparring totem, this Battle Arena offers endless fun and excitement. The multi-part ball linking system allows for even more customization options, so you can truly make it your own. 

The Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid action figure is the star of the show, with its spinning feature and included ripcord for even more action-packed battles. 

Inside the playset, you'll find everything you need to get started, including 1 Deluxe Arena, 1 Special Attack Bakugan, 2 Clan Flags, 3 Sparring Totems, 1 Character Card, 1 Special Attack Card, 2 Gate Cards, 1 XL Rip Cord, and 1 Bakugan Token. 

As an official Bakugan product, you can trust the quality and care commitment by Spin Master. Plus, the online game code included will unlock exciting features in the popular game, Roblox. 

Collectors will love the special attack variants and battle packs available for this collectible toy. 

Don't miss out on this incredible Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid. Get ready to battle and customize to your heart's content!
